entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add the possibility replace a nuget source (force dotnet nuget add) #31461
  • dotnet test exit with code 2 when test run aborted #31364
  • dotnet test build fails with error MSB4803 #30514

Updated

  • The error message (& output) for NETSDK1148 could be MUCH more helpful #31557
  • Solution builds fine in Visual Studio but remote build failing in Azure DevOps failing with 'Error MSB406' #31380
  • Allow dotnet test command to override the Net runtime version #31102
  • Wrong assembly is being referenced in solution #3301
    Discussion
  • GenAPI incorrectly generates collection-based interface implementation #31570
  • [Questions] How to know the latest installed dotnet sdk version on a non sdk style project file like .vcxproj #30289
  • The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'linux-linux/amd64' is not recognized #31616
  • Dotnet test doesn't run separate TargetFrameworks in parallel #19147
    Backlog
  • Option --list-tests should take into account --filter option #8643
    Backlog
  • DotNet Test is no longer filtering by Category #30931
  • "dotnet test" using the glob pattern #30655
  • Switch language for .NET CLI on macOS/Linux #13938
    Backlog
  • dotnet publish fails with --output Cannot create/move a file when that file already exists #30321

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31629
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • GenAPI: a work around for a generation an explicit interface implementation indexer. #31628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault property #31626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.11.2 to 19.12.0 in /eng/dependabot #31576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2150801 #31622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update branding to 6.0.117 #31602
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Killbit BinaryFormatter across most .NET 8 project types #31591
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adding locked messages as there is overlocalization in at least 5 of … #31421
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Prep 7.0.3xx for GA release #31618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #31581
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Respond to ProduceReferenceAssembly default changing to true #31598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [WIP do no review yet] Use MSBuild Server in interactive mode only #31597
    Area-CLI
  • add implementation and test for add Trademark assembly attribute #31611
    untriaged, Area-Tools
